definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
projective geometry/same as 射影幾何|射影几何
projective geometry/same as 射影幾何學|射影几何学

sentences.english: On the night side of Saturn, the planet casts a dark shadow over its rings.
sentences.chinese: 土星的黝黑阴影投影在夜晚一侧的土星环上。

sentences.english: The table uses a beamer below the surface with a mirror to project the visualizations.
sentences.chinese: 下面的表使用一个带有镜面投影仪项目的可视化。

sentences.english: The method can be used to reduce the noise of projections and filter non-white noise.
sentences.chinese: 该方法能降低投影数据的噪声，而且能过滤非白噪声。

sentences.english: The calculated field data are applied to reconstruct the contour projections of the scatterer successfully.
sentences.chinese: 计算结果用于散射体轮廓的投影重建获得成功。

sentences.english: But the parallel-beam can not be realized directly in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 平行束投影在工程上是不能直接实现的。

sentences.english: Basic composition of models is projective transformation from multi-dimensional allocation to bivariate distribution.
sentences.chinese: 模型的基本结构是一个从多维到低维的投影变换。

sentences.english: Finally, for making internal gears , the forming principle by projected gear is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 内圆柱螺旋齿轮的投影齿轮造型原理。

sentences.english: The basic function of an overhead projector is similar to that of a slide projector.
sentences.chinese: 投影仪的基本功能与幻灯机相似。

sentences.english: Click Skyland URL for office supplies like projector, screens etc.
sentences.chinese: 投影仪，幻灯机，银幕销售。

sentences.english: The texture projection maps the colors of the image to the geometry.
sentences.chinese: 纹理贴图会把图像的颜色直接投影在几何体上。

sentences.english: Star Wars themed alarm clock will project the time on your wall.
sentences.chinese: 这款星球大战主题闹钟会把时间投影到你的墙上。

sentences.english: The jointed density function of two angles is developed for recognition of polyhedral objects.
sentences.chinese: 利用投影角度的联合概率函数可识别多面体。

sentences.english: The encryption keys are generated and transmitted via a KDM (Key Delivery Message) to the projection site.
sentences.chinese: 密钥通过KDM生成并传输到投影机上。

sentences.english: One on authoring debugger visualizers and two on debugging debugger visualizers.
sentences.chinese: 一对创作调试实物投影机及两个调试调试插画。

sentences.english: Reverse Project Technique (RPT) is a typical image reconstructed algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 卷积反投影是二维图像重建的一种典型算法。

sentences.english: This projection screen can be set in motion.
sentences.chinese: 这个投影屏幕可以进行运动分析。

definition: main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
